fields.title: Harris 1958 California Election Survey, study no. 351

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
Survey investigates voter attitudes toward senatorial and gubernatorial candidates in California.

Voters are also questioned about such national issues as Social Security and environmental pollution.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Harris obtained a cross-section sample of California voters. Attitudes on various topics were collected by questionnaire in a face- to-face interview; California voters; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-351;

distributor.distributorName: Louis Harris Data Center, University of North Carolina
